setting.title: View Loginhistory
setting.columnlabels: Client,Client User,User Name,Login Time,Application Type,Assigned To
setting.query: select $COLUMNS$ from tbl_loginhistory JOIN tbl_client ON client_clientid=loginhistory_clientid JOIN tbl_clientuser ON clientuser_clientuserid=loginhistory_clientuserid JOIN tbl_applicationtype ON applicationtype_applicationtypeid=loginhistory_applicationtypeid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee on employee_employeeid=client_employeeid
setting.where: ('$loginhistory_clientid$' = '0' OR loginhistory_clientid = '$loginhistory_clientid$') AND ('$loginhistory_clientuserid$' = '0' OR loginhistory_clientuserid = '$loginhistory_clientuserid$') AND ('$loginhistory_applicationtypeid$' = '0' OR loginhistory_applicationtypeid = '$loginhistory_applicationtypeid$') AND ('$loginhistory_employeeid$' = '0' OR client_employeeid = '$loginhistory_employeeid$') AND (loginhistory_logintime BETWEEN '$loginhistory_logintime_from$' AND '$loginhistory_logintime_to$')
